---
title: "Typst id-less subfigures"
format:
  typst:
    keep-typ: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
        -
          ['#grid\(columns: 2, gutter: 2em,(\r\n?|\n)  \[(\r\n?|\n)#block\[(\r\n?|\n)#figure']
        -
          ['#figure\(\[(\r\n?|\n)#grid\(columns: 2, gutter: 2em,(\r\n?|\n)  \[(\r\n?|\n)#block\[(\r\n?|\n)#figure']
